Package org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode

Class RobotHardware.HeadingTelemetry

java.lang.Object
org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.RobotHardware.HeadingTelemetry
Enclosing class:
RobotHardware
public class RobotHardware.HeadingTelemetry extends Object
Provides a convenient interface for setting and updating telemetry for robot movements during heading-driven events.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    HeadingTelemetry(String motionHeading)
    Construct and set up all telemetry.

  • Constructor Details

    • HeadingTelemetry

      public HeadingTelemetry(String motionHeading)
      Construct and set up all telemetry. Passing anything but "Turning" (case insensitive) causes wheel targets and positions to also be sent to telemetry.
      Parameters:
      motionHeading - value such as "Driving" or "Turning"

  • Method Details

    • setTargetPositions

      public void setTargetPositions(int leftFrontPosition, int leftRearPosition, int rightFrontPosition, int rightRearPosition)
      Set target wheel positions. If constructed with "Turning" (case insensitive), this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      leftFrontPosition -
      leftRearPosition -
      rightFrontPosition -
      rightRearPosition -

    • updateWheelData

      public void updateWheelData()
      Update actual wheel positions and speeds. If constructed with "Turning" (case insensitive), actual position data is ignored.

    • setTargetHeading

      public void setTargetHeading(double heading)
      Set the target heading telemetry
      Parameters:
      heading - Target

    • updateHeadingData

      public void updateHeadingData(double speedAdjustment)
      Update all heading telemetry.
      Parameters:
      speedAdjustment - Speed adjustment to show in telemetry

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Telemetry Auto Clear is set to false when this class is constructed. Call this once when finished with the instance to set Auto Clear to true.
